WorkItem.Description:
If you run an application which used the ribbon on a system which doesn't have the COM objects, it crashes with the following exception:
 
System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x80040154): Die COM-Klassenfactory für die Komponente mit CLSID {926749FA-2615-4987-8845-C33E65F2B957} konnte aufgrund des folgenden Fehlers nicht abgerufen werden: 80040154.
   bei RibbonLib.Ribbon.CreateRibbonFramework()
 
Could you handle this? Wrap it and throw a new PlatformNotSupported- Exception with a message, that the ribbon is not available.
WorkItem.Summary: Error Handling if Ribbon is not available (COMException (0x80040154))
